messages.message:
And in UAT, the home button doesn’t go home anymore:
https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1004

this is intended because of the new “My Hub” designs

cc @Xindi Xu @Weiming Wu
@Lee do you think it would be more clear if renamed "AI Hub" to "My Hub" as we do with custom apps?
I do feel like we should have a consistent experience across build, converse and custom apps

I found it annoying that I wasn’t working as a back button. I opened the app from the Home Screen. Then it took me somewhere totally different that I hadn’t seen before. I thought it would make more sense to take you to whenever you opened the app from.

I prefer to use the back button from the browser to go back but that's not working in the build and we should fix that :sweat_smile: . +1 to Hannah's suggestion on renaming it to "My Hub". I think with the new My Hub overhaul, more users will actually open up projects from My Hub than the home page (just my guess)...

I agree back button should be used for taking back to your last place. We've received feedback already that users want an easy way to navigate back to My Hub (rather than the explore screen which is what it does right now), so I think we should change to "My Hub" so that it's clear where we're taking a user
